name: Delta Race (apardieu)
description:
Delta Race is a hypercasual mobile game where you have to avoid obstacles and collect coins !

Reach the end of levels before your opponents by diving with your hang-glider !

Designed for mobile (Android only), you can perform touches by clicking to dive and releasing to fly up. The APK can be download here : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RxMAUNLxFTrVWByitn7x1MaXoXQIln3P/view?usp=shari...
